newHere.title: New Here?
newHere.description: Get personalized resources based on your interests, and needs. Visit our questionnaire to start your customized learning journey!

startKoreanJourney.title: Start Your Korean Journey!
startKoreanJourney.description: Unlock your potential and dive into the world of Korean language and culture. Join us today and take the first step towards mastering Korean!

readRewiews.title: Join Hundreds of Successful Learners
readRewiews.description: We've helped hundreds of learners achieve their Korean language goals. You can be the next one!

eLearning.title: Your Korean Mastery: Expert Courses Await!
eLearning.p1: Start your Korean fluency journey with our expert-led video lessons! Our curriculum supports all levels, from beginner to advanced.
eLearning.p2: Enjoy a variety of resources for daily conversations and exam prep, keeping your learning engaging and effective!

onlineClasses.title: Personalized Tutoring with Experienced Instructors
onlineClasses.p1: Discover the flexibility of our courses, whether you prefer personalized one-on-one sessions or engaging group classes.
onlineClasses.p2: Learn Korean with confidence alongside our experienced instructors who tailor each lesson to your individual needs.

1.comment: Danbee est une tr√®s bonne professeure. Elle est gentille et le fait qu'elle parle fran√ßais aide beaucoup pour progresser et comprendre le cours. Elle explique les choses tr√®s clairement et prend le temps de r√©pondre aux questions. Je vous la recommande fortement !

2.comment: Tres bon professeur, explique de maniere simple et clair les mots / phrases qui sont nouveau pour moi, et me permet de m'entrainer a discuter dans des contexte interessant !! Merci !!

3.comment: I'm at the beginning of my learning and I needed someone to give me a good base! Very good teacher who takes the time to correct pronunciation and explain, I always have a good time.

instagram.title: Discover Korean Culture and Language
instagram.description: Dive into the rich and diverse world of Korean culture and language. Join me on Instagram for updates and insights.

Danbee-Park.slogan: Tutor fluent in French and English. From Hangul to full mastery: together, let's conquer Korean!

paragraphs.0: Hello, I am Danbee Park, and I am studying the Korean language to become a Korean teacher in France. I was born and raised in South Korea. I am currently in Montpellier, France, as I am also passionate about this country. My hobbies are foreign languages and weightlifting üèãüèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è. I can teach in Korean, French, and English. I look forward to meeting you and helping you learn Korean.
paragraphs.1: I am currently studying to obtain a Korean language teaching certificate. I manage my lessons in a personalized way by analyzing each student's needs to offer the best learning conditions. My lessons use textbooks as well as resources I create myself. All levels are welcome, from beginner to advanced.
paragraphs.2: I will lead a personalized course based on the student's situation and expectations. I will try to make learning Korean fun for students by using various methods.

skills.title: My Skills & Qualifications
skills.adapt: Adaptation of lessons to the student's needs
skills.listen: Attentive and responsive to the student's needs
skills.multiLevel: Ability to teach different language levels
skills.lngs: Languages: Korean (Native), Japanese (N2/C1), French (B2), and English (B2)

preply.title: Want to learn Korean with me?
preply.description: Join me on Preply for personalized Korean lessons tailored to your needs.
